top_stories.title: Facebook’s AI can now suggest edits to the photos still on your phone
top_stories.description: Facebook is rolling out a new Meta AI photo suggestion feature across the U.S. and Canada that lets its AI recommend edits to images stored on users’ camera rolls — even if they haven’t been shared. The feature is currently opt-in only.
top_stories.author: Sarah Perez
top_stories.content: Facebook is rolling out a new Meta AI photo suggestion feature across the U.S. and Canada that lets its AI recommend edits to images stored on users’ camera rolls — even if they haven’t been shared. The feature is currently opt-in only.

top_stories.title: Microsoft Azure Unveils World’s First NVIDIA GB300 NVL72 Supercomputing Cluster for OpenAI
top_stories.description: Microsoft Azure today announced the new NDv6 GB300 VM series, delivering the industry’s first supercomputing-scale production cluster of NVIDIA GB300 NVL72 systems, purpose-built for OpenAI’s most demanding AI inference workloads. This supercomputer-scale cluster features over 4,600 NVIDIA Blackwell Ultra GPUs connected via the NVIDIA Quantum-X800 InfiniBand networking platform. Microsoft’s unique systems approach applied radical engineering Read Article
top_stories.author: Ian Buck
top_stories.content: Microsoft Azure today announced the new NDv6 GB300 VM series, delivering the industry’s first supercomputing-scale production cluster of NVIDIA GB300 NVL72 systems, purpose-built for OpenAI’s most demanding AI inference workloads. top_stories.title: Transforming the physical world with AI: the next frontier in intelligent automation
top_stories.description: In this post, we explore how Physical AI represents the next frontier in intelligent automation, where artificial intelligence transcends digital boundaries to perceive, understand, and manipulate the tangible world around us.
top_stories.author: Sri Elaprolu, Alla Simoneau, Paul Amadeo, and Randi Larson
top_stories.content: In this post, we explore how Physical AI represents the next frontier in intelligent automation, where artificial intelligence transcends digital boundaries to perceive, understand, and manipulate the tangible world around us.
